sentence: Trump: 'Our Country Is Being Systematically Destroyed' Former President Donald Trump (Jason Behnken/AP) By Eric Mack | Saturday, 09 April 2022 07:18 PM Stumping for North Carolina GOP Senate primary candidate Ted Budd, former President Donald Trump added an announcement of his official endorsement of Dr. Mehmet Oz in Pennsylvania's hotly contested GOP Senate primary.
author: NationalWatch
title: Trump: ‘Our Country Is Being Systematically Destroyed’

sentence: President Trump vows to ‘demand justice for the Jan. 6 prisoners and full protection of their civil rights like was received by ANTIFA, Black Lives Matter who murdered people throughout our country.’ pic.twitter.com/I9VxV5zpjh President Trump: ‘We must ensure that every election can be FULLY and quickly audited.’ pic.twitter.com/9sWhOHumo6 Trump confirmed his endorsement for Dr. Mehmet Oz, in Pennsylvania, who is running for U.S. Senate.
author: DML News App
title: WATCH: Highlights from Trump’s speech at North Carolina rally

sentence: Trump made headlines over the weekend for endorsing Dr. Mehmet Oz for Senate ahead of the Republican primary in Pennsylvania.
